column4: FLeiXiuS--> using network manager with the correct key -- you can not connect?
FLeiXiuS--> is the interfaces file correct? all the necessary entries for WPA is there? or is it missing?
FLeiXiuS--> try and do an strace of the nm and see if you can follow through where it fails
there are no entries in /etc/network/interfaces when NetworkManager (<0.7) is managing an interface
